mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into message (app_user_id, title, content, `type`,category, `state`, add_time, update_time,en_title,en_content,en_type,comment) values (#{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update message set app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, en_title = #{enTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_content = #{enContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_type = #{enType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select message_id, app_user_id, title, content, `type`, `state`, add_time, update_time,en_title,en_content,en_type,comment,category from message where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select message_id, app_user_id, title, content, `type`, `state`, add_time, update_time,en_title,en_content,en_type,comment from message

select message_id, app_user_id, en_title AS title,en_content AS content,en_type AS `type`,category, `state`, add_time, update_time from message WHERE app_user_id = #{appUserId} AND category = #{category} ORDER BY add_time DESC
select message_id, app_user_id, title, content, `type`, `state`, add_time, update_time from message WHERE message_id = #{messageId}
